blocks.text: Si se omite el segundo número, se toma como el final.

Python 3.11.2 (Feb  7 2023, 16:38:35) [MSC v.1934 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

squares = [0, 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81]
print(squares[7:])

Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

sq = [0, 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64]
print(sq[4:])
